Name: Holovid Movie: Cannibal Fungi
Details: Set in the Periphery planet of Delos III, this Davion holovid movie tells the story of a mysterious mercenary company called Mounted Coyotes who arrive at the Davion world to fight an invasion of giant cannibal fungi who hunt the human colonists for food. The movie is also known because of the pending lawsuit filed against its producers by Colonel Jaime Wolf, the commander of the mercenary group Wolf's Dragoons, who claims that the hired soldiers in the movie are based on himself and his Dragoons.
